@Keepitquiet

Netorare is a genre of anime, manga, or video game focused on infidelity. Commonly a subgenre of pornographic hentai anime, netorare storylines typically focus on the internal distress caused by one member in a relationship cheating on the other.
wa happeninh

I stick my head back in to see comments and of course it's a bunch of morons trying the dip shit "It's not ntr if they aren't in a relationship" how fucking dumb are you people? It's ntr if the author attempts to put you in the shoes of a pathetic inferior loser. It doesn't have anything to do with the relationship status of the characters involved, hell the japanese authors call their shit ntr when a mom has sex with someone who aint the son. They don't use your dumb ass definition of ntr, where the hell did you get that dip shit definition from? Do you people think there is no difference between ntr and netori? Because they are very different.

@L0LP0P No one is raging over a fictional relationship. I don't give a fuck about fictional characters, or fictional relationships, or fictional cheating. I've got no real issue with netori. I'm just here to jerk off, and I can't jerk off to this. My issue isn't with the fictional characters my issue is with how the author is intending us to feel. I don't want to feel like a loser, pathetic, or inferior that doesn't get me off. The reason people think you're a cuck is because you're unable to understand why people don't like this, "normal" people don't want to be in this guys shoes. Why the fuck would I go to fictional artwork to be put in the shoes of anything less than a winner? I have the ntr tag blocked because I don't want to see stuff like this, that is why I'm upset why have a tag blocking feature if people don't tag their shit?
I got time to kill so why not use it I guess
Wow, I love it when people do a paragraph long of constructive criticism in a Hentai site. What a waste of time lmao

@LordCellofEarth9 I don't really care whether you listen to what I say or not or if you believe me to be an NTR lover or not, I'm just here to fap and enjoy. Yes, people have the right to comment but if they start caring for fictional characters that you nothing about and are not real then that's when I'll have my concerns (not that my concerns are important anyways). Like I said, if you like the art, then good and if not, then it's good as well. Just don't go raging over fictional relationships.

@Keepitquiet Yeah I kind of agree, this is pretty WEAK NTR, but this and the other one uploaded kind of had unneeded filler! (They went with the "early Bird gets the worm, where even though it looked like the guy and girl were hitting off, the assholes had to be pushy and got them instead! Kind of came out of left field and paints the girls as easy sluts, especially the other one with the boss where it looked like the Boss was abusing his authority and position to get what he wants, I love how Pro-NTR defense is "stop thinking like the loser cuck" in these's stories when it's clear that was the point, there is no "envision yourself as the chad/ugly fat guy" that's just them trying to distract from the fact they "know" the cuck is who the reader is suppose to be seeing themselves as! And the chad/UFG might as well be accepting "that's how the writer sees THEM the NTR fan! if their going to play "that route" to get out of admitting the NTR writer is insulting and getting rich doing so!)

@L0L1POP I'm sorry, why is it that Pro-NTR like yourself ALWAYS go down the "stop complaining about fictional characters" route! The moment you do, you just make yourself look like a hypocrite since YOUR the one complaining now! I'm neutral but your comment of shamming commenters is kind of pathetic! Follow your own advice, you don't have to comment "either" you know! As long as there's a comment section, people are free to text what they wish! Positive or negative! Find a way to become part of the site and gain the power to delete comments if you like if your feeling this salty buddy!

The amount of people here getting madabout fictional characters and fictional cheating is kinda sad yet hilarious. Look if you didn't want this kind of doujin then just leave, don't complain and find a doujin that suits your taste more. The artist wanted to draw NTR and that's what they want to draw. If you like it then good, you're appreciating good art and fapping to it but if you don't like then good as well, you don't like these kinds and I respect that. Just go find something else and don't complain about it cause no one is going to listen to you.

@fuushi ok what is the point of this? It's not for you to get off to the sex. It's to put the reader in the place of a loser, to experience being pathetic and inferior. IF you get off on that you enjoy being a cuck, but I don't I'd prefer not to read stuff that attempts to put me in the shoes of a loser, I don't get off on that.
